channel.title: Big java issue please help, i giv rep!
channel.description:
ok i made a Richscape server but when i click run it says "'java' isnt an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue...", when i click compile it says "the system can't find the patch specified. Press any key to continue..." So i gave up on making a server so i just thought I'd join a server called deathscape. i download the client and when i click run the black command prompt box thingy appears and disappears in the matter of half a second. So i think to myself whatever is causing me to not run Richscape client in order to make my server is probably also causing me not to log on a server that isn't even mine. Heres some codes:
Richscape compile: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
Richscape run: @echo off title RichScape client java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 pause
deathscape compile: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
deathscape run: @ECHO OFF TITLE Deathscape JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
Classpath: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
Path: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\
That's all the information i can possibly think of, please tell me the problem, P.S. i already have JDK6 update 10

item.title: Big java issue please help, i giv rep!

item.description:
@visiblesound wrote:

silab, where would i put that in client.java? i mean in client.java theres so much writing? should i just delete it all and paste that code in there?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2008, 04:25:57 am[/size][hr]…

Read full topic

@ECHO OFF TITLE Silab Garza's Client Version 2 JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI PAUSE

item.title: Big java issue please help, i giv rep!
item.dc:creator: @visiblesound visiblesound
item.description:
@visiblesound wrote:

ok i made a Richscape server but when i click run it says “‘java’ isnt an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue…”, when i click compile it says “the system can’t find the patch specified. Press any key to continue…” So i gave up on making a server so i just thought I’d join a server called deathscape. i download the client and when i click run the black command prompt box thingy appears and disappears in the matter of half a second. So i think to myself whatever is causing me to not run Richscape client in order to make my server is probably also causing me not to log on a server that isn’t even mine. Heres some codes:

Richscape compile: @echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

Richscape run: @echo off
title RichScape client
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32
pause

deathscape compile: @echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

deathscape run: @ECHO OFF
TITLE Deathscape
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

Classpath: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Path: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\

That’s all the information i can possibly think of, please tell me the problem, P.S. i already have JDK6 update 10
